name: Karussell für max. 18 elektronische Füllwaagen, Typ K18E
description:
for installation on the ground, consisting of:
- Revolving platform, built as circular disc, outside
diameter 5300 mm, for max. 18 filling scales
- Central column, to carry the revolving platform, incl.
a generously dimensioned live-ring ball bearing
- Ring distribution conduit for compressed air with
18 pcs. connecting branchs
- Ring distribution conduit for LPG with 14 pcs. connecting branchs,
material with AZ 3.1 acc. to EN 10204
with pressure and tightness testing WAZ 2.2 acc. to EN 10204
- Swivel joint for compressed air and el. current,
ex-proof (connection from above)
DN 25, PN 10
- Swivel joint for LPG (connection from below) DN 80, PN 40
with AZ acc. EN 50.049-3.1
- 18 pcs. shut-off valves for compressed air, DN 6, PN 10
- 18 pcs. shut-off valves for LPG, DN 10, PN 40
with AZ acc. to EN 50.049-3.1
- 18 set fixing angle to fix the filling scales on the
revolving platform in each position
